sys_ui_message.message:
The MyContribution features are available throughout the year.
- **Objective setting** : this be added /edited /deleted at anytime during the year. For year end, this can only be added /edited /deleted on the year end review template on available - **Snapshot**/**check**-**in review template**: this can be requested at anytime during the year until the preparation of year review template•Gift of feedback – Can be requested / provided to colleagues at anytime of the year - **Manager** **evaluation year end review:** Only assigned and completed once a year (assigned by the Workday Functional Configurator)
